bill.title: Mississippi Youth Career and Workforce Preparation Grant Program; create.
bill.description: An Act To Create The Mississippi Youth Career And Workforce Preparation Grant Program To Be Administered By The Office Of Workforce Development; To Provide That The Program Shall Be Used By The Office Of Workforce Development, With The Mississippi Department Of Employment Security Acting As The Fiscal Agent, For The Purpose Of Providing Support For Youth After-school Programs That Help With The Development Of Soft And Hard Skills And That Are Focused On Career And Workforce Preparation; To Provide That Eligible Grant Recipients Shall Include Youth Development Nonprofit Organizations Affiliated With A Congressionally Chartered National Organization That Has National Quality And Safety Standards; To Provide The Criteria That Must Be Submitted To The Office In Order For An Applicant To Be Eligible For A Grant; To Provide Reporting Requirements About The Program; And For Related Purposes.

history.action: Referred To Economic and Workforce Development;Appropriations
